article:
Known as the Animal Lady in this area which I lived in, I was always asked to lend a hand in animal   _  .One afternoon three little neighbor girls ran up   _  my door, saying a baby squirrel was on the sidewalk. I quickly  _  the kids and they led me to a tiny squirrel still with milk
teeth. I  bent down  and held the little creature up

I was about to carry it into my   _  when I found several other

bread and milk to eat. The poor starving things went  _  as

I phoned a lady in the next town who   _  a small squirrel shelter.
She had a big back yard with large  _  surrounded

I love that those little girls cared enough about the squirrels to seek out the   _  of the Animal Lady! And I really  _  getting
to help the baby creatures. And then the  _  of
